footerOne.subscribeText: Want to be the first to know the freshest news? Subscribe to our newsletter!

privacyPolicyPage.smallText: We're always looking for new ways to provide privacy for our customers.
privacyPolicyPage.commitmentText: We recognize the importance of protecting your personal information and are committed to safeguarding your privacy. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your data to ensure that you can use our services with confidence. Our goal is to maintain transparency and uphold the highest standards of data protection.
privacyPolicyPage.commitmentItem1: We never sell your personal data to third parties.
privacyPolicyPage.commitmentItem2: Your information is encrypted and stored securely.
privacyPolicyPage.commitmentItem3: Access to your data is restricted to authorized personnel only.
privacyPolicyPage.commitmentItem4: We regularly review our privacy practices to ensure compliance.
privacyPolicyPage.commitmentAdditionalText: We use your information solely for improving our services and providing you with a personalized experience. Whether you're a new visitor or a long-time customer, your trust is our priority. Our data collection practices are transparent, and you have full control over your information. We continuously strive to offer you the best experience possible while respecting your privacy rights.
privacyPolicyPage.useInformationText: Your data is collected only when necessary, and we utilize it to enhance your experience with us. Here's a breakdown of how we handle your information:
privacyPolicyPage.useInformationItem1Text: We use information such as your email address and username to create and manage your account, allowing you to access our services seamlessly.
privacyPolicyPage.useInformationItem2Text: We may access your contact details to provide support and answer your inquiries promptly. Your feedback helps us improve our services.
privacyPolicyPage.useInformationItem3Text: Data about your interactions helps us understand how our services are used, enabling us to refine and enhance our offerings to better suit your needs.
privacyPolicyPage.useInformationItem4Text: With your consent, we send promotional materials tailored to your interests. You can opt out of marketing communications at any time.
privacyPolicyPage.useInformationItem5Text: We adhere to legal obligations and ensure your data is handled lawfully. This includes processing information for fraud prevention, safety, and legal requests.
privacyPolicyPage.useInformationAdditionalText: We are dedicated to using your data responsibly, ensuring that all collection and usage comply with applicable data protection laws. Our focus is on enhancing your experience while maintaining the highest level of privacy and security. We take all necessary measures to ensure that your data is protected against unauthorized access and misuse.
privacyPolicyPage.cookiesText: Our website uses cookies and similar technologies to provide a seamless user experience. Cookies help us understand how you interact with our content and enable us to personalize your visit.
privacyPolicyPage.cookiesItem1Text: These are necessary for the basic functionality of our website, enabling features like logging in, saving preferences, and maintaining session information.
privacyPolicyPage.cookiesItem2Text: We use these to analyze how our visitors use our site, enabling us to improve our services by understanding user behavior and trends.
privacyPolicyPage.cookiesItem3Text: These cookies help deliver targeted advertisements relevant to your interests, providing a more tailored browsing experience.
privacyPolicyPage.cookiesConsent: By continuing to use our site, you consent to the use of cookies. However, you can manage your cookie preferences at any time through your browser settings. For more information about our cookie practices, please refer to our Cookie Policy. We are committed to transparency and offer you the tools to control your data preferences.

aboutSection.introText: As Gamestorm, we continue to open doors to new worlds every day and we are working excitedly to introduce new gaming devices!
aboutSection.salesText: Sales, or 6% of the world’s population.
aboutSection.dailyCustomersText: Our products have over 2 million unique daily customers.
aboutSection.expertsText: Experts collaborating to blow your mind in one place.
aboutSection.fullExperienceText: Our devices give you the full experience.

contactSection.contactUsToday: Contact us today for a free consultation

gamesSection.willGiveYouTheBestFeelings: Will Give You The Best Feelings
gamesSection.ourProductsAreDistinguishedByReliability: Our products are distinguished by reliability, low response time, and user-friendliness for better immersion in the game.

jobsSection.beliefText: Our belief is that being simple, honest, self-driven and motivated combined with the constant pursuit of the ultimate company atmosphere can help grow a creative and robust team.

partnersSection.happyToWorkWith: We are happy to work with
partnersSection.proudToSupport: We are proud to support industry leaders around the world.

teamSection.teamDescription: Our dynamic team blends tech-savvy sales professionals, knowledgeable customer service representatives, innovative marketing strategists, and visionary product managers.

aboutPage.whiteText: Our Simple is Motto Fun for
aboutPage.smallText: We continue to open doors to new worlds every day and we are working excitedly for creating new games and unique ideas!
aboutPage.valuesDescription: Our values are a reflection of our inner selves, shaped by our unique experiences, beliefs, aspirations, and cannot be simply adopted from others or chosen arbitrarily.
aboutPage.focusSubtitle: Flexible, focused and innovative: we’re focused on achieving your project
aboutPage.storyDescription: We have a beautiful story, worth telling. Let us walk you through our biggest milestones.

blogPage.professionalGameDesignAndDevelopment: Professional Game design and Development services since 1995

contactPage.smallText: Our support goes all the way. We love hearing from customers and visitors and are always happy to help.

gamesPage.smallText: Our projects feature unique mechanics, fine-tuned gameplay, and eye-catching visual style.

servicesPage.smallText: Our systematic approach to art development ensures high delivery standards for games and game-based solutions, from look development to engine integration.

bannerSection.title: Enjoy Gaming World
bannerSection.description: Creating innovative, fun-filled gaming devices that bring vibrant colors to your gaming experience.

bannerTwoSection.description: Gamestorm is the ultimate destination for playing, discussing and creating games.

communitySection.description: Join the revolution and immerse yourself in the ultimate gaming experience, where the boundaries between reality and fantasy blur, and the only limit is your imagination. Sign up now and be the first to play our latest game releases.

contactUsSection.description: Please fill out the form and let us know about your concerns. We will try our best to provide optimized solutions.

communityTwoSection.communityDescription: Our work has brought together a community of
communityTwoSection.gamersDescription: Gamers from all over the world

faqsSection.description: Our gaming company develops games for multiple platforms and is always looking for talented individuals to join our team. Quality and player satisfaction is our top priority.
faqsSection.faqDescription: GameStorm is a full-service gaming studio company specializing in game development, art, design, and project management

servicesSection.EndToEndGameDevelopment: End-to-end game development, revamping, and outsourcing services. Immersive technology expertise for top-class gaming experiences

productsSection.OurDedicatedShop: Our Dedicated Shop is Here for You.
productsSection.ExploreVariety: Explore an extensive variety of gaming equipment and peripherals.

ourServicesSection.OurGamingStudio: Our gaming studio delivers top-notch services in game development, art & design, NFT creation, and VR & AR solutions.
ourServicesSection.TransformingGaming: Transforming gaming with cutting-edge and platform-independent solutions.

keysSection.TheFourKeyComponents: The Four Key Components of a
keysSection.LongLastingFunDescription: Our games offer explosive fun with playability and constant content updates through our games as a service approach.
keysSection.ForEveryoneDescription: When developing our video games, we make sure that every player can scratch their gaming itch, from casual to completes to speed runners.
keysSection.UniqueTwistDescription: We put our own spin on beloved game genres, from a racing game where the goal is to stop, to a point-and-click game in a 360-degree environment.
keysSection.GradualLearningCurveDescription: Our games are easy to learn but hard to master. This makes our games both accessible to newcomers and challenging for pros.

lifeSection.topTitleP: Experience the magic of gaming development with a look inside our studio. See the art, science, and innovation at work.
lifeSection.joinContainerP: Still haven't found your dream job? Join Team Gamestorm and become the next Gamestorm of an ever-growing family!

howItWorksSection.simplePowerfulEfficientProcess: A Simple yet Powerful and efficient
howItWorksSection.gameDevelopmentNextLevel: Take your game development for next level in 10 simple steps. Always work Done By the Following Process

gameFeaturesSection.clientCentricApproach: A client-centric approach coupled with creative freedom, professional experimentation, and a willingness to create beyond the limits makes us a great partner for businesses looking to deliver a product that stands out.
